channel.title: Kaiju Drops
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Kaiju Drops" - I need to get a Kaiju Drop for Monochrome.

item.title: Re: Kaiju Drops
item.content:encoded: If you need a kaiju drop, and your village is big enough to do kaiju-gasms, don't split your efforts. Focus on one monster and unload on it. 10% chance on one kaiju is way way better than 1% chance on 3 kaiju.

item.title: Re: Kaiju Drops
item.content:encoded:
are you in a big village or small one. just attack the kaiju with all of your stamina every day. if you are in a smaller village you will get more chances to hit each kaiju and if you're in a big village they will end up summoning alot of kaiju so just give it a chance. i'm still in season 1 but i can get in 5 hits per day at level 33 at season 3 you should be able to do 10 or more hits a day if you really put in the effort. if your village doesn't summon enough monsters that could be the issue as well.

*Edit* oh ya if you have the Destiny Fulfilled item with the full moon that should help

item.title: Re: Kaiju Drops
item.content:encoded: Well Terri 3 is a good way to get a drop. Get something that you can trade for a monster drop, such as a rune. There are also some kages, myself included, that will hand out extra drops to the highest attacker.

item.title: Kaiju Drops
